title: Ovogene Catalog
description: Developed a web platform catalog of donor materials for medical clinics. Created a system with multi-brand support, each with its own design and settings. Implemented a complex search, filtering and order management system with a full cycle from creation to delivery.
highlights: Role and permission system with detailed authorization

title: MijnZetel
description: Developed a cross-platform application for political news and polls. Created a system with iOS, Android and Web support on a single codebase. Implemented authentication, voting system, news feed and content management through Firebase.

title: Mobile App for Laundry Service
description: Developed from scratch a cross-platform mobile application for a dry cleaning service. Created an order system with logistics service integration, two-factor authentication and push notifications. Implemented B2B and B2C segmentation with different registration flows.
note: Project name hidden due to NDA

title: Admin Panel for Laundry Service
description: Maintained and developed an administrative panel for managing a dry cleaning service. Worked with existing Vue.js architecture, added new features for order management, integration with logistics services and notification system.

title: CharterTickets
description: Maintained and developed an existing flight booking system with integration of 30+ airlines. Worked with modular architecture on Yii2 Framework, integrated two new partners into the system, maintained API for partners and promo code system. The system included multi-currency, affiliate program and asynchronous order processing.
highlights: Maintenance and development of existing system
Integration of two new partners into the system
Work with modular Yii2 Framework architecture
API support for partners and promo code system
